mapper.select:
select a.matchid, a.carno, a.icid, a.operatype, m.operaname, a.cartype, t.itemid, t.planid, t.taskcode, t.materialcode, t.materialname, t.sourcename, t.targetname, t.sourceplace, t.sourceoperaname, t.targetplace, t.planmaterialcount, t.planweight, t.grossb, t.tareb, t.suttleb, t.shipcode, t.ship, t.snumber, t.suttleapp, t.middlemancode, t.middlemanname, a.unitcode, a.unitname, t.usermemo, a.sysmemo, a.createoperacode, a.createoperaname creator, to_char(a.createdate,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') createdate, a.auditlevel, a.approverfirst, a.approversecond, to_char(a.firsttime, 'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') firsttime, to_char(a.secondtime, 'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') secondtime, a.documentcode, decode(a.documentcode, '0', decode(m.materialflow, '1', '到货单', '发运单'), (select b.documentname from b_documenttype_t b where b.validflag = 1 and b.documentcode = a.documentcode)) documentname, m.isormeasure, m.materialflow from l_applicationbill_t a left join l_applicationbill_item_t t on (a.matchid = t.matchid and t.validflag > 0) LEFT JOIN m_operaconfig_t m ON a.operatype = m.operatype where a.validflag > 0 and a.types=0
and a.createdate>= to_date(#{begintime}, 'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss')
and a.createdate <= to_date(#{endtime}, 'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss')
and t.planid like '%' || #{planid}||'%'
and a.matchid like '%' || #{matchid}||'%'
and a.carno like '%' || #{carno}||'%'
and t.materialname like '%' || #{materialname}||'%'
and t.targetname like '%' || #{targetname} ||'%'
and t.sourcename like '%' || #{sourcename}||'%'
and a.operatype=#{operatype}
and a.documentcode=#{documentcode}
and a.ship=#{ship}
and a.sourceplace=#{sourceplace}
and a.unitname like '%' || #{unitname}|| '%'
order by a.createdate desc

select distinct l.matchid, l.carno, l.icid, m.modelname operatype, l.cartype, t.itemid, t.planid, t.taskcode, t.materialcode, t.materialname, t.sourcename, t.targetname, t.sourceplace, t.sourceoperaname, t.targetplace, t.planmaterialcount, t.planweight, t.grossb, t.tareb, t.suttleb, t.shipcode, t.ship, t.snumber, t.suttleapp, t.middlemancode, t.middlemanname, l.inoutdate, l.unitcode, l.unitname, l.usermemo, t.usermemo sysmemo, l.createoperacode, l.createoperaname creator, decode(l.flag , 0, '未使用', 1, '已使用',2,'终止',8,'完成') isoruse, l.createdate cdate, l.auditlevel, l.approverfirst, l.approversecond, to_char(l.firsttime, 'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') firsttime, to_char(l.secondtime, 'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') secondtime, l.documentcode from (select case when f.matchid is null and m.planid is null and m.imatchid is null then 0 when f.matchid is null and m.planid is not null and m.imatchid is not null and m.validflag = 1 then 1 when f.matchid is null and m.planid is not null and m.imatchid is not null and m.validflag = 8 then 8 when f.matchid is not null and m.planid is not null and m.imatchid is not null then 2 end flag, m.* from (select s.planid, s.imatchid, a.* from l_applicationbill_t a left join (select i.planid, i.matchid as imatchid from l_applicationbill_item_t i where i.validflag is null or i.validflag > 0 group by i.matchid, i.planid) s on a.matchid = s.planid where a.id = -1 and a.validflag > 0) m left join (select t.matchid from l_forcestop_log_t t where t.matchid not in (select u.matchid from l_forcestop_log_t u where u.usermemo = '异常还原 终止业务还原') group by t.matchid) f on m.imatchid = f.matchid) l, l_applicationbill_item_t t, l_model_t m where (l.matchid = t.matchid and t.validflag > 0) and (l.documentcode = m.operatype and m.validflag > 0) and l.validflag > 0 and l.types = 1
and (l.createoperaname=#{creator} or approverfirst=#{creator})
and t.planid like '%' || #{planid}||'%'
and l.matchid like '%' || #{matchid}||'%'
and l.carno like '%' || #{carno}||'%'
and t.materialname like '%' || #{materialname}||'%'
and t.targetname like '%' || #{targetname} ||'%'
and t.sourcename like '%' || #{sourcename}||'%'
and l.documentcode=#{documentcode}
and l.sourceplace=#{sourceplace}
and l.flag=#{isoruse}
and l.firsttime is null
and l.firsttime is null
and l.secondtime is null
and l.firsttime is not null
and l.secondtime is not null
and auditlevel=2 and l.firsttime is not null
and l.createdate>= to_date(#{begintime}, 'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss')
and l.createdate <= to_date(#{endtime}, 'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss')
order by l.createdate desc,t.itemid desc
mapper.insert: insert into l_applicationbill_t (matchid, carno, icid, rfidid, operatype, cartype, unitcode, unitname, usermemo, sysmemo, createoperacode, createoperaname, createdate, types, documentcode, fdocumentno, businessname , saleman , inoutdate, isormeasure , reason , auditlevel, routeid,id,approverfirst) values (#{matchid}, #{carno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{icid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rfidid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operatype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'C', #{unitcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{unitname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sysmemo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createoperacode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sysdate, #{types,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{documentcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fdocumentno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{businessname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{saleman,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{inoutdate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isormeasure,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{auditlevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{routeid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{approverfirst,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

insert into l_applicationbill_item_t (itemid, matchid, planid, taskcode, materialcode, materialname, sourcecode, sourcename, targetcode, targetname, sourceplace, sourceoperaname, targetplace, planmaterialcount, planweight, grossb, tareb, suttleb, shipcode, ship, snumber, suttleapp, middlemancode, middlemanname, measureunit , isorin , isorout, returntime , outtime , returntotal , outtotal, usermemo, saleitemid, materialspec, steelname, pictureno, prodline) values (l_applicationbill_item_s.nextval, #{matchid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{planid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{taskcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{materialcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{materialname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sourcecode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sourcename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{targetcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{targetname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sourceplace,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sourceoperaname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{targetplace,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{planmaterialcount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{planweight,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{grossb,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tareb,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{suttleb,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shipcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ship,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{snumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{suttleapp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{middlemancode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{middlemanname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{measureunit,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{isorin,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{isorout,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{returntime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{outtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{returntotal,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{outtotal,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{usermemo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{saleitemid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{materialspec,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{steelname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pictureno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{prodline,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into l_curr_temp_t (carno, icid, rfidid, matchid, operatype, validflag, planid, orderno, taskcode, materialcode, materialname, sourcecode, sourcename, sourceplace, targetcode, targetname, ship, suttleapp, usermemo, entertime, entergatename, grossb, tareb, snumber, motorcadecode, motorcadename, memo1, memo2, routeid, materialspec) values (#{carno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{icid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rfidid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{matchid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operatype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 1, #{planid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{taskcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{materialcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{materialname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sourcecode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sourcename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sourceplace,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{targetcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{targetname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ship,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{suttleapp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{usermemo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{entrytime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{entergatename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{grossb,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tareb,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{snumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{motorcadecode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{motorcadename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{memo1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{memo2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{routeid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{materialspec,jdbcType=VARCHAR}||' '|| #{steelname,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update: update l_applicationbill_t set carno=#{carno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, icid=#{icid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, operatype=#{operatype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, unitcode=#{unitcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, unitname=#{unitname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, usermemo=#{memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sysmemo=#{sysmemo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, updateoperaname=#{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, updatedate=sysdate , documentcode=#{documentcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, businessname=#{businessname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, saleman=#{saleman,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, inoutdate=#{inoutdate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, isormeasure=#{isormeasure,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, reason=#{reason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, auditlevel=#{auditlevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, routeid = #{routeid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, approverfirst=#{approverfirst,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where matchid=#{matchid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select count(1) from l_applicationbill_item_t where itemid=#{itemid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.update: update l_applicationbill_item_t set planid=#{planid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, taskcode=#{taskcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, materialcode=#{materialcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, materialname=#{materialname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sourcecode=#{sourcecode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sourcename=#{sourcename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sourceplace=#{sourceplace,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sourceoperaname=#{sourceoperaname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, targetcode=#{targetcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, targetname=#{targetname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, targetplace=#{targetplace,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, planmaterialcount=#{planmaterialcount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, planweight=#{planweight,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, grossb=#{grossb,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tareb=#{tareb,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, suttleb=#{suttleb,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, shipcode=#{shipcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ship=#{ship,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, snumber=#{snumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, suttleapp=#{suttleapp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, middlemancode=#{middlemancode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, middlemanname=#{middlemanname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, measureunit=#{measureunit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, isorin=#{isorin,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , isorout=#{isorout,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, returntime=#{returntime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, outtime =#{outtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, returntotal=#{returntotal,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , outtotal=#{outtotal,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, validflag=1, usermemo =#{usermemo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, saleitemid = #{saleitemid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where itemid=#{itemid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update l_curr_temp_t set carno= #{carno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, icid=#{icid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, operatype=#{operatype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, validflag=#{validflag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, planid=#{planid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, orderno=#{orderno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, taskcode=#{taskcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, materialcode=#{materialcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, materialname=#{materialname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sourcecode=#{sourcecode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sourcename=#{sourcename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sourceplace=#{targetcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, targetcode=#{carno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, targetname=#{targetname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ship=#{ship,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, suttleapp=#{suttleapp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, usermemo=#{usermemo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, grossb=#{grossb,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tareb=#{tareb,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, snumber=#{snumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, motorcadecode=#{motorcadecode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, motorcadename=#{motorcadename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, routeid=#{routeid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where matchid=#{matchid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
update l_applicationbill_t set validflag=0, validflagtime=sysdate, validflagoperaname=#{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where matchid=#{matchid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
update l_applicationbill_item_t set validflag=0, validflagtime=sysdate, validflagoperaname=#{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where matchid=#{matchid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
update l_curr_temp_t set validflag=0 where matchid=#{matchid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select t.itemid, t.saleitemid, a.matchid, a.carno, a.icid, a.rfidid, a.operatype, a.cartype, t.planid, t.taskcode, t.orderno, t.materialcode, t.materialname, t.sourcecode, t.sourcename, t.targetcode, t.targetname , t.sourceplace, t.targetplace, t.shipcode, t.ship, t.middlemancode, t.middlemanname, t.grossb, t.tareb, t.suttleb, t.snumber, t.suttleapp, a.usermemo memo, a.approverfirst, a.firsttime, a.approversecond, a.secondtime, t.measureunit , t.isorin , t.isorout, t.returntime , t.outtime , a.documentcode, a.businessname , a.saleman , a.inoutdate, a.isormeasure , a.reason, a.routeid, t.usermemo, (select l.snumber from l_applicationbill_item_t l where l.matchid = a.fdocumentno and to_char(l.itemid) = t.saleitemid) materialcounts, l_getcount_f(#{matchid,jdbcType =VARCHAR}, t.itemid) returntotal, l_getcount_f(#{matchid,jdbcType =VARCHAR}, t.itemid) outtotal from l_applicationbill_t a left join l_applicationbill_item_t t on (a.matchid= t.matchid and t.validflag > 0) where a.validflag > 0 and a.matchid =#{matchid,jdbcType = VARCHAR}

select distinct t.itemid, a.matchid, a.carno, a.icid, a.documentcode operatype, a.cartype, t.planid, t.taskcode, t.orderno, t.materialcode, t.materialname, t.materialspec, t.sourcecode, t.sourcename, t.targetcode, t.targetname, t.sourceplace, t.targetplace, t.shipcode, t.ship, t.middlemancode, t.middlemanname, t.grossb, t.tareb, t.suttleb, t.snumber, t.suttleapp, a.usermemo memo, a.approverfirst, a.firsttime, a.approversecond, a.secondtime, t.measureunit, t.isorin, t.isorout, t.returntime, t.outtime, t.returntotal, t.outtotal, a.documentcode, a.businessname, a.saleman, a.inoutdate, a.isormeasure, a.reason, t.usermemo, to_char(a.createdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') as reserve1, m.modelname as reserve2, a.createoperaname as creator, a.fdocumentno from l_applicationbill_t a left join l_applicationbill_item_t t on (a.matchid = t.matchid and t.validflag > 0) left join l_model_t m on (m.operatype = a.documentcode and m.validflag>0) where a.validflag > 0 and a.matchid in (#{matchid,jdbcType = VARCHAR}) order by t.itemid

select l.saleitemid, a.id,nvl(a.documentcode,0) documentcode,a.routeid from l_applicationbill_item_t l left join l_applicationbill_t a on l.matchid = a.matchid where l.validflag > 0 and l.matchid = #{matchid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.update: update l_applicationbill_t set approverfirst = #{approverfirst,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, firsttime = sysdate where matchid = #{matchid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
update l_applicationbill_t set approversecond = #{approversecond,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, secondtime = sysdate where matchid = #{matchid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
update l_applicationbill_t set giveupfirst = #{giveupfirst,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, giveupftime = sysdate, firsttime ='' where matchid =#{matchid}
update l_applicationbill_t set giveupsecond = #{giveupfirst,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, giveupstime = sysdate, approversecond ='', secondtime = '' where matchid = #{matchid}
update l_applicationbill_item_t set isoruse=#{isoruse,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fendanflag=0 where itemid=#{saleitemid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select count(1) from l_applicationbill_t a, l_applicationbill_item_t t where (a.matchid = t.matchid and a.validflag > 0 and t.validflag > 0) and t.planid = #{matchid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and a.types = 0
select t.routeid id from B_MATERIAL_T t where t.validflag > 0 and t.materialcode=#{materialcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and rownum=1
select t.id from L_WORKLINE_T t where t.validflag > 0 and t.foldercode = (select t.foldercode from B_MATERIAL_T t where t.materialcode = #{materialcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and rownum = 1) and rownum=1
select t.mflag ,t.isormeasure from m_operaconfig_t t where t.operatype = #{operatype,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and t.validflag>0
select m.operatype id, m.operaname text from L_PLAN_V t left join m_operaconfig_t m on t.operatype = m.operatype where t.carno = #{carno,jdbcType=VARCHAR} group by m.operatype, m.operaname

select 'add' || rownum itemid, a.matchid, a.operatype, t.planid, t.materialcode, t.materialname, t.sourcecode, t.sourcename, t.targetcode, t.targetname, t.snumber, t.suttleapp, a.usermemo memo, t.measureunit, t.isorin, t.isorout, t.returntime, t.outtime, a.documentcode, decode(a.documentcode, '108', l_getcount_f(#{matchid,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, t.itemid), 0) returntotal, decode(a.documentcode, '111', l_getcount_f(#{matchid,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, t.itemid), 0) outtotal, t.usermemo, t.itemid saleitemid, t.snumber materialcounts from l_applicationbill_t a left join l_applicationbill_item_t t on (a.matchid = t.matchid and t.validflag > 0) where a.validflag > 0 and a.matchid = #{matchid, jdbcType = VARCHAR}

select t.planid, t.carno, t.saleitemid, t.materialcode, t.materialname, t.sourcecode, t.sourcename, t.targetcode, t.targetname, t.documentcode, t.routeid, t.auditlevel, t.operatype, t.materialspec, t.measureunit, t.steelname, t.pictureno, t.prodline, t.itemid, t.usermemo, t.snumber, t.middlemanname from l_plan_v t where t.planid in (${planid}) and t.saleitemid in (${saleitemid})

select t.planid, t.carno, t.saleitemid, t.materialcode, t.materialname, t.sourcecode, t.sourcename, t.targetcode, t.targetname, t.documentcode, t.routeid, t.auditlevel, t.operatype, t.materialspec, t.measureunit, t.steelname, t.pictureno, t.prodline, t.itemid,t.snumber from l_plan_all_v t where t.planid in (${planid}) and t.saleitemid in (${saleitemid})
select cardid from b_card_t b where b.carno = #{carno,jdbcType = VARCHAR} and b.validflag = 3 and b.cardclass = 1 and rownum = 1
select m.isormeasure from L_CURR_TEMP_T t left join m_operaconfig_t m on t.operatype = m.operatype where t.carno = #{carno, jdbcType = VARCHAR} and t.validflag = 1
select count(1) from l_applicationbill_t l where l.validflag>0 and l.id=#{id, jdbcType = VARCHAR}

select a.matchid, t.sourcename, t.targetname, a.inoutdate, a.createoperaname creator from l_applicationbill_t a, l_applicationbill_item_t t where (a.matchid = t.matchid and t.validflag > 0) and a.validflag = 1
and a.types = 1
and a.createoperaname=#{creator}
and a.matchid like '%' || #{matchid}||'%'
and t.targetname like '%' || #{targetname} ||'%'
and t.sourcename like '%' || #{sourcename}||'%'
and a.documentcode=#{fdocumentno, jdbcType = VARCHAR}
group by a.matchid, t.sourcename, t.targetname, a.inoutdate, a.createoperaname order by a.inoutdate desc
mapper.update: update m_measure_t set carno= #{carno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, operatype=#{operatype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, planid=#{planid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, materialcode=#{materialcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, materialname=#{materialname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sourcecode=#{sourcecode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sourcename=#{sourcename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sourceplace=#{targetcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, targetcode=#{carno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, targetname=#{targetname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ship=#{ship,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, usermemo=#{usermemo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, grossb=#{grossb,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tareb=#{tareb,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, motorcadecode=#{motorcadecode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, motorcadename=#{motorcadename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, basket=#{saleitemid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where matchid=#{matchid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
